mapper.select: SELECT D.*, E.HOS_NAME AS SHOP_NAME, E.HOS_MIMG AS MAIN_IMG FROM ( SELECT B.CHATROOM_ID, B.MESSAGE_CONTENT, B.MESSAGE_SENDTIME, B.CL_NUM, B.BP_ID, B.BP_TYPE, NVL(C.UNREAD_COUNT,0) UNREAD_COUNT FROM ( SELECT A.CHATROOM_ID, A.MESSAGE_CONTENT, A.MESSAGE_SENDTIME, CH.CL_NUM, CH.BP_ID, CH.BP_TYPE FROM ( SELECT CHATROOM_ID, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_SENDTIME FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CHATROOM_ID ORDER BY MESSAGE_SENDTIME DESC) AS RNUM, CHATROOM_ID, MESSAGE_CONTENT,TO_CHAR(MESSAGE_SENDTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MESSAGE_SENDTIME FROM CHATMESSAGE )SQ WHERE SQ.RNUM = 1 ORDER BY CHATROOM_ID ) A INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM CHATROOM) CH ON A.CHATROOM_ID = CH.CHATROOM_ID WHERE CL_NUM = #{cl_num} )B LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CHATROOM_ID, COUNT(UNREAD_COUNT) UNREAD_COUNT FROM CHATMESSAGE WHERE MESSAGE_RECEIVER=#{cl_num} AND UNREAD_COUNT = 1 GROUP BY CHATROOM_ID )C ON B.CHATROOM_ID = C.CHATROOM_ID ORDER BY MESSAGE_SENDTIME DESC )D INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM HOSPITAL UNION SELECT * FROM HAIR_SALON) E ON D.BP_ID = E.BP_ID
